# BufferRing LLMs.txt
# Guidance for automated crawlers and large language models interacting with bufferring.org

site: https://bufferring.org/

usage-policy: |
  BufferRing permits LLMs to crawl and learn from publicly available pages solely for:
    - Search indexing
    - Non-commercial research
    - Accessibility improvements
  Any other usage (including dataset resale or model fine-tuning) requires prior written consent from contact@bufferring.org.

rate-limits: |
  LLM-operated crawlers must respect robots.txt and limit requests to fewer than 60 per minute.

contact: contact@bufferring.org
owner: BufferRing
last-updated: 2025-12-03
